name: 3D Whac-A-Mole
description:
[Introduction to the game]
3D Whac-A-Mole is a very interesting game of groundhog. The rules of the game are very simple. It is a success to fight all the gophers that come out.
[Game operation]
Click the emerging hamster with the left mouse button.
[Game objective]
Within the specified time, all the gophers that come out will be shot down.
The game will become more and more difficult over time. It is not easy to get high scores. Friends who like challenges can try it.
